casebody.data:
EMERALD PLACE DEVELOPMENT PROPERTIES, LLC, Plaintiff
v.
Stephen F. HORNE, III, Administrator of the Estate of Stephen F. Horne, II, Deceased; Stephen F. Horne, III; Stephen F. Horne, II PA; Horne & Horne, PLLC ; William F. Hill; and William F. Hill, PA, Defendants No. COA16-1138 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. August 01, 2017

AFFIRMED.
